Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the heart of Denverâ€™s southeast community Virginia Village, this shopping center is a family-oriented place with neighborhood friendly retailers including Ace Hardware, Little Kickers Swim School and Unravel Coffee. Just across the street is the Montessori School of Denver which enrolls around 300 students in pre-school through 8th grade. This center is highly accessible, conveniently located and the unique co-tenant mix makes it a desirable place to do business.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Shared access with King Soopers anchored center. Part of a 276 unit apartment project.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The space is currently built out as a fast casual restaurant with a great southwest facing outdoor patio. It is part of a 276 unit apartment project, The District. The building and monument signage are on Hampden Ave, which sees almost 60,000 cars/day. Access is at a signalized intersection off Hampden Ave & Locust St and shares access with the King Soopers anchored center next door. The center has 85 dedicated retail parking spaces in addition to a parking garage. Call broker for pricing and additional information.
